content: रूक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Rough, harsh, not smooth or soft (as touch, sound &c.), रूक्षस्वरं वाशति वायसोऽयं <ls>Mk. 9. 10</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Astringent (taste). {@--3@} Rough, uneven, difficult, austere. {@--4@} Sullied, soiled, dirtied; <ls>R. 7. 70</ls>; <ls>Mu. 4</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">5.</ls> {@--5@} Cruel, unkind, harsh; नितांतरूक्षाभिनिवेशमीशं <ls>R. 14. 43</ls>; संरभंरूक्षमिव सुंदरि यद्यदासीत् <ls>V. 3. 20</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 32</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 91.</ls> {@--6@} Arid, parched up, dry, dreary; स्निग्धश्यामाः क्वचिदपरतो भीषणाभोगरूक्षाः <ls>U. 2. 14.</ls> (रूक्षीकृ means ‘to make rough’, ‘soil’, ‘besmear)’. --क्षः A tree.
